parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: Dealed
parameters.description:
The status of the alert events. Valid values:

*   **y**: handled
*   **n**: unhandled
*   **a**: all states

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **100**

parameters.name: RiskLevelList
parameters.description: The risk levels of the alert events.
